message:
Had an extensive review meeting of the Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchai Yojana with top level officials.  

Officials briefed us on the projects which would be completed by June 2017 & other projects likely to be completed ahead of schedule. Highlighted our priority towards drip & micro-irrigation & called for extensive usage of technology in the irrigation sector.
http://nm-1.in/zAXUKQ
